data.export.title: Export Data
data.export.description: Export all your data including accounts, categories, transaction records, etc. Data will be downloaded in JSON format for easy backup or migration to other systems.
data.delete.title: Delete Account
data.delete.warning: Warning: This operation will permanently delete your account and all related data
data.delete.irreversible: This operation cannot be undone! It is recommended to export your data before deletion.
data.delete.confirm.title: Confirm Account Deletion
data.delete.confirm.description: You are about to permanently delete your account and all data. This action cannot be undone.
data.delete.password.prompt: Please enter your password to confirm deletion:
data.delete.password.required: Please enter password to confirm deletion
